name.ch: 軟體定義無線電平台技術

goal.ch: 講解實務軟體定義無線電平台(Zedboard + AD9361)建置之相關軟硬體技術
goal.en: To nurture the techniques for setting up and application of the practical Software-Defined Radio platform (Zedboard + AD9361)

outline.ch:
週次內容備註
1Xilinx Vivado Development Environment-1
2Xilinx Vivado Development Environment-2
3Hardware Description Language: Verilog-1
4Hardware Description Language: Verilog-2
5Arm AMBA (Advanced Microcontroller Bus Architecture)  AXI, AXI-Lite and AXIS Specification-1
6Arm AMBA (Advanced Microcontroller Bus Architecture)  AXI, AXI-Lite and AXIS Specification-2
7Zynq Processor Architecture-1
8Zynq Processor Architecture-2
9Zedboard Architecture and Schematics-1
10Zedboard Architecture and Schematics-2
11Zynq Hardware and Software Co-Design: SDK, PYNQ-Jupyter-1
12Zynq Hardware and Software Co-Design: SDK, PYNQ-Jupyter-2
13RF Frontend: AD9361
14SDR TX/RX Mechanism-1
15SDR TX/RX Mechanism-2
16Standard Peripherals Interface-1: UART, SPI, I2C, I2S, SPDIF, USB, CAN, Ethernet, SDIO
17Standard Peripherals Interface-2: UART, SPI, I2C, I2S, SPDIF, USB, CAN, Ethernet, SDIO
18Final Term Project

18Final Term Project

textbook.ch:
1.教科書(中文)：無 (自編講義教材)
2.教科書(英文)： Nil
3.參考書(中文)：Xilinx Reference Manuels 
4.輔助教材：軟體：Xilinx Vivado/SDK/Jupyter；硬體：Zedbaord, AD9361 EVM
5.課堂要求：出席課堂進行實作演練
textbook.en:
1.教科書(中文)：無 (自編講義教材)
2.教科書(英文)： Nil
3.參考書(中文)：Xilinx Reference Manuels 
4.輔助教材：軟體：Xilinx Vivado/SDK/Jupyter；硬體：Zedbaord, AD9361 EVM
